name: Outrunner 3
description: Do you think you won last time, but it wasn't! Meet the long-awaited (By me and my cat) triquel of best platformer sequel from 2077 - Outrunner 3! You know the rules. You are completely alone and you can trust no one. Run through dangerous levels, jump through enemies and leave obstacles behind you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Steam doesnt support Win XP but my game do Processor: Even a potato can run this Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 310 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1Ghz or faster Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: 2 1080 ti if you're cold Storage: 310 MB available space Sound Card: Any
